reviews.text: A poor quality station in need of redevelopment. Access is from the main road and finding the correct platform can be confusing. The entrance area is tiny and horribly cramped at peak times. There is a tiny but expensive shop. Dot matrix displays are at one end of the platform thus making it difficult for many passengers to see. Note to cyclists:This is a crime hot-spot and not a safe place to leave a cycle.

This morning I had a wardrobe malfunction with my skirt. A big thank you to the man who called Alex. Alex you were so kind to help me instead of hightening my feeling of stress you made me laugh. Your compassion in my moment of need was very well received. Thank you so much your a credit to Southall Station and TFL xx
Beware of keeping your cycles tied at the station, it is a regular scene of cycles parts missing and sometimes gradually whole cycles missing

Southall train station is the quickest way to travel to Paddington Station in Central London. Paddington Station has undergone a  refurbishment which gives this listed heritage building a brand new look. Passengers can change at this station to travel outside of London.
